query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		structuredscopedocument {
			_id,
			asm_system_tags,
			asset_type,
			attachments,
			availability_requirement,
			confidentiality_requirement,
			created_at,
			cvss_score,
			display_name,
			eligible_for_bounty,
			eligible_for_submission,
			id,
			identifier,
			instruction,
			integrity_requirement,
			new,
			total_resolved_reports,
			updated_at,
		}
	}
